DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtain Age 1855 18 < BMI < 35 Menstrual cycle history : MRA group : regular cycle LRA1 group : history regular cycle , variable cycle allow ( 3 month amenorrhea ) LRA2 group : variable cycle allow ( 3 month amenorrhea ) Has take hormonal contraception within 2 month initiate study procedure Agrees use backup contraception throughout course study , sexually active ( condom provide ) 3.0 < Prolactin < 20.0 ug/L 0.30 < TSH < 5.50 mIU/L Normal complete blood count ( CBC ) Beta human Chorionic Gonadotropin < 5IU/L . Smokers Documented ovarian failure History currentlydiagnosed infertility unexplained female origin ; Medical condition know suspect interfere reproductive function ( include PCOS ) Presence one ovary Ovaries inaccessible transvaginal ultrasonography The use medication know suspect interfere reproductive function Ongoing pregnancy Lactation Participation investigational drug trial 30 day prior prestudy visit Planning undergo surgery course study .
